title: Mr. Magkaisa
author: Mr. Magkaisa
created_time: January 30, 2023, 08:50:45 AMLast edit: December 10, 2024, 10:50:47 AM by Mr. Magkaisa
content: Is it possible that AI currency can change your life? Since the ChatGPT platform has been trending recently, that's why in this topic anyone here will know the top 10 AI crypto coins, this is based on the Forbes Advisor article.But before we start let's find out what AI is.Answer: It is a technology such as a computer or applications to perform tasks that can be done by intelligence being like people.But it is not hidden from the knowledge of the majority that they do not notice that we use AI technology daily. Just like on Facebook, there is AI here to predict the things you want to know, so sometimes when you think something comes out here.It's the same with google, it can also predict your next words or type, and many other applications that use AI.QuoteTOP AI CRYPTO COINS1. The GRAPH(GRT) - An indexing protocol, what is this? A way to easily find a particular one information, just like the indexes in the bookeasily find a topic or information you want know, well it's listed alphabetically from A-Z then there is another page where you can read it. Instead of reading, If you read the entire book, the index will help you, your search.GRAPH can also be compared to GOOGLE, searching here will give suggestions as to what you are searching for. But here at GRAPH, it's on the blockchain works. So it will help a lot to be easy to know specific data in a network. One of it's because of the problems in the blockchain suffer in certain data or transactions, although public this is it. But most of these are not decentralized as in The GRAPH.2. SingularityNET(AGIX) - A blockchain platform, where everyone is allowed to build, share, and monetize AI services. It has an internal marketplace where users can pay for services and browse using its native cryptocurrency AGIX. If it's DEVS can make money from the AI solutions and models they sell for use in AI applications.3. Fetch.ai(FET) - A blockchain-based AI learning platform. It is also about automating business tasks such as data processing and trading.This platform also provides tools to developers, to further optimize other industries such as smart homes and transportation whose native cryptocurrency is FET which is used to pay transactions in the network.4. Ocean Protocol(OCEAN) - an open-source protocol that allows individuals or businesses to exchange and monetize data securely and transparently.Developers can also create applications. Like securing and accessing data from multiple sources including public and private repositories. It also has a marketplace for data owners and buyers to buy, sell or trade data assets securely.Users can also create a smart contract to implement the exchange of digital assets between two parties using the decentralized nature of the ocean.5. iExec(RLC) - an AI platform that empowers users to monetize their computing power. It can also support fields such as health care, rendering, and Fintech.6. Numeraire(NMR) - this is an AI blockchain network that is like a hedge fund, which uses AI and machine learning to invest in the stock market globally.It is also the first cryptocurrency created and released by a hedge fund named NUMERAI.7. dKargo(DKA) - a blockchain that uses AI technology to resolve trust issues within the logistic sector by providing credible data using blockchain technology.8. Phala Network(PHA) - this is an AI-augmented blockchain platform about cloud computing, but with a strong focus on privacy. It can be compared to traditional cloud computing services such as amazon AWS or google cloud. But Phala is a decentralized alternative.9. Covalent(CQT) - this is a network that leverages big data technology from various blockchains such as Avalanche, Ethereum, Polygon, and others. Developers can use this multichain data to develop apps and solve problems in finance, retail, and more.Its other use is in taxes, the data can be easily accessed like those in decentralized exchanges like Uniswap, and because of this, you can easily track your taxables in crypto. It can also be used in DEFI or NFT projects that require specific data actions.10. Cortex(CTXC) - it is an open-source decentralized peer to peer blockchain platform that supports AI model to be developed and executed in a distributed network.With the Cortex platform, AI democratization can be achieved where AI models can be easily integrated into smart contracts and the creation of AI-enabled decentralized applications.FINAL ASSESSMENT    At this time the crypto market as a whole is doing slightly better, bitcoin is up 10% and Ethereum is up 2%.Regarding AI technology we can't deny that we use it in our daily lives, such as our cellphones, laptops, apps, and even on the internet, it's there even if you don't notice or know. And in our world, we are always doing something to make our lives progress even more by using technology. AI technology has not changed, but in the future, its use will be more active, and potentially many jobs will be lost due to this technology. there are jobs that AI can do. There is also news that an AI bot has been installed in a medical licensure exam in the U.S. it is so advanced that it may be even better than humans in the future. But it's not that perfect yet, there are AIs that we use but there are AI priests that we use that are still in the test new phase to say that they can replace a person, of course, it's not like that. So I think AI is probably the future of our world. But it is also not guaranteed that everyone who invests here will grow because the new technology that is coming is also failing. We still do not know what will happen in the future.That's why it's still good to be mindful in investing here, knowing the risk we're going to take.

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: I remember when Defi games started in 2017 and the community in the crypto space didn't pay much attention to it, because at that time ico projects or crowdfunding were trending. But when 2018 entered, if I'm not mistaken, it gradually became a trend until axie infinity exploded, and after this event, play-to-earn games, and metaverse suddenly started trending.After that, web3 came in, and now it's AI that seems to be just like Defi and metaverse too, which was ignored when it started, and I think it will gradually be noticed because it will be trending eventually, for sure this is just my opinion. That's just the time for the trend to explode.

comments.author: Blitzboy
comments.body: The combination of cryptocurrency and AI will make a huge change to the current economy. But it might take time since there is no many significant projects. AI will be more interesting in the future and I bet many projects will utilize its power for a variety of aspects such as building scaffold-blockchain, marketing or writing advertising content. I will certainly learn more about AI and see what we can do with those new inventions of human Thank you for sharing knowledge. I will definitely make a further research on these coins

comments.author: JamesDaniel90
comments.body: Hi,I have been thinking of investing in Singularity Net or Singularity Dao as I want to get involved with AI but need to do further research before I do.Can I have your thoughts on these and if they are a good investment , why?

comments.author: ivankoh
comments.body: Yes, i will, Maybe I will consider some AI coin options in revolutionizing web3 games and metaverse.  2 months ago ChatGPT has caused a terrible and unimaginable attraction of technology that people can actually verify.  It is certainly a technology that people will adopt in the future or aspects surrounding it as an asset class.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Something I noticed as a crypto enthusiast is that, do not miss any wave of crypto trend from the day of launch just as @gunhell16 said. It was only those who took the advantage of ICO, crowdfunding that got something very special during the wave. Although the rate at which scam projects were launching then was becoming much alarming, boiled down to DeFi and many more. IA project will be very much useful in the future. I think the above list project are very potential and interested to take part among them, maybe just investing for long time.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: Nope, not gonna change my life. First of all, stop calling these AI, they are not AI, it is literally just boring data processing stuff, nothing really big, not like they are going to rise up and take over the world lol, they are boring. However, there is also a fact that we are talking about something unique here with how they are just using the highest and brand new tech out there to make it work, and in reality we all know it won't work like that, it will be quite different. This is why it is quite important to learn that these will not be big deals and won't make you any profit. You can go ahead and try for yourself but I am not going to do it.

First of all, stop calling these AI, they are not AI, it is literally just boring data processing stuff, nothing really big, not like they are going to rise up and take over the world lol, they are boring. This is why it is quite important to learn that these will not be big deals and won't make you any profit. You can go ahead and try for yourself but I am not going to do it.It will be the same as with the rest of the breakthrough technologies. Projects that promote new technologies, but in fact are just another example of speculation and the rapid enrichment of its creators, as well as big investors. I doubt that the token holders of these projects will use artificial intelligence technology and somehow promote it. It will all come down to the banal pump and dump.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Since the trend is on the ai, there's really the chance that any of those might pump. People should just take note about that "chance". There's no guarantee that they will surely pump because of the trend and you know if you know on this market. I am only familiar with GRT but as I look at its chart, 2 years ago the ATH was set and now, all I just see is straight line for its chart.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Yeah, it's taking the crypto world by storm and I think this is the next big thing in the market, the whole AI and metaverse thingy.So good that the OP has somewhat given us some projects that could lead to bigger things in the future in AI. But then again as his disclaimer, we need to do our due diligence and research everything first before we invest our hard earn money here and hope that someday it will turn out to be big.Probably this is just a background to us presented, then DYOR and see which projects fits us, just saying.

comments.author: poodle63
comments.body: AI technology in cryptocurrencies are lacking if compared with existing AI that's owned by some companies out there, even though I'd sometimes considers AI coin as an investments but honestly if only the AI could be more advanced it could be great but it seems majority of the coins are just platform for an AI not creating an AI that's truly acts like an AI.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Crypto technology becomes serious now and here we are in the AI thing trend, I hope it competes with the existing AI technology companies.As I see it, it has great potential to change the crypto universe works like the metaverse which become a trend last year, and now this AI stuff.Though there are potential, we should be careful about this hype, proper research should be conducted because it's the same as the previous project that also has hype like NTF and Defi which we know there are some projects aren't have good result, but they raised because of the hype.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: AI might be the next trend, it was metaverse and defi before and AI surely could brings in the bullruns that if there's any groundbreaking AI that could be like the AI that's already famous nowadays, I don't know maybe we're too early in seeing that AI gonna be the next future or maybe AI will never be ones because it seems AI isn't that popular and it seems the fame still revolves around layer 1 and layer 2 smart contract platform.It seemed as if AI while might be revolutionary, doesn't have that much influence to begin with in term of driving the market valuation.

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: It is a greed trend like DeFi, NFT, Metaverse, GameFi, it's not different. When greed is over, game will be over and most of people who buy those tokens will face with loss.AI is useful but it brings plus and minus for human depending on how each person use it. Generally, I believe it will bring more bad effects than usefulness. Like with smart phones, nowadays it is so hard for me (maybe us) to remember phone numbers of my relatives. That is certainly bad and it shows that we are relying more on technical devices. When devices broken but we are in emergency, what to do?With AI, I believe it will negatively affect young generation. They will rely on it more and become more lazy with their brain activities. With less mental, brain exercises I think it is not good for them in future.

comments.author: BitcoinPanther
comments.body: I believe this projects are more on the buzz word side.  They are taking advantage of the current popularity of AI application thus taking the hype of AI trend.  Honestly these projects are just overlapping, instead of them working together to have a higher percentage of delivering better quality programs and softwares, they are competing to grab money from unsuspecting investors.  Quote from: hd49728 on January 31, 2023, 03:41:40 AMIt is a greed trend like DeFi, NFT, Metaverse, GameFi, it's not different. comments.author: dwminer1
comments.body: Thanks OP for this post, useful compilation. For my part, I would add one more project, Matrix AI(MAN). They are working on it for several years. The new roadmap looks promising in my opinion: https://1369953351-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2FT5LtcFS1DoKk05KGaZdm%2Fuploads%2FOnsRSLdWol2UnvQRYM9t%2FMatrix%203.0%20Roadmap%20Full%20EN.pdf?alt=media&token=ef0cf8d3-81e0-473a-9da5-5ffad4dffe50The token is currently tradeable on Kucoin: https://www.kucoin.com/trade/MAN-USDT?rcode=rPH7VCSThe team is active in social media and telegram, new team members are being hired. The current capitalization is around $11 million, so despite latest growth(50% from yesterday, 100% in 7 days), IMO there is still a lot of room for growth.

comments.author: ololajulo
comments.body: Many negative news stories are being spread in the media about cryptocurrency, and I do not enjoy spreading them. However, they all concern me. A petition has been circulated to halt all major AI development, which could prevent chatGPT from being upgraded. A disturbing aspect of this development is the involvement of many technology leaders, such as Wozniak, Elon Musk, Chris Larsen, etc. Is there any expectation for startups that have raised funds in cryptocurrency for the time being?

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Artificial intelligence applications have recently become the talk of people, they are getting more and more popular day by day so I expect them to have the next trend in crypto.Among the coins you mentioned, there are two AI coins that I am interested in:Quote2. SingularityNET (AGIX)3. Fetch.ai (FET)Very good projects for which I expect a great future. Of course, this does not mean that they are the best. Everyone has to do their own research.

comments.author: Psynthax
comments.body: it's good that there are many AI project but I think if at least some of them don't have implementation that could reach individual users, then it will just stay being used for industry, take example the openAI that could reach the individual users, it gained fame easily but still it's still good that there are efforts being made and actually the fact that these AI take advantage of the blockchain technology.

comments.author: FrozenBit
comments.body: Quote from: Psynthax on March 29, 2023, 09:35:24 PMit's good that there are many AI project but I think if at least some of them don't have implementation that could reach individual users, then it will just stay being used for industry, take example the openAI that could reach the individual users, it gained fame easily but still it's still good that there are efforts being made and actually the fact that these AI take advantage of the blockchain technology.The chatgpt craze has made a big impact on the AI ​​field, I see more people are gradually interested in this field although in terms of features, I admit that it is not too new. Looking at this market some projects have been pursuing the field of AI for a long time and have only recently received a positive change, I think the current market valuation is very low in terms of the potential this field brings. for our lives. It is possible for some to think that it will completely become a new trend that will explode in the next bull cycle, but it is also necessary to properly evaluate the nature of the potential or just hype from signal abusers. market.
